name: Project Deadly Contagion
description:
You are a very caring parent and have to feed your young to grow up strong and healthy. Hunt and feed your children until they become adults, but run, they are very hungry.

Capture healthy monsters and feed your cubs to grow. Beware of the infected, this is a plague, they proliferate very quickly.

Controls:

 WASD: controls the player 

Space: Run for a short period 

Left E / Click: Release the captured monster 

Right R / Click: Trap

Use the healing area when available, healing the infected

Send me your feedback to continue and improve the game
Thank You
